lead_paragraph: PERLOV--Betty Rosenberg, 98, of Brooklyn, NY, died July 4, 2016. Daughter of Vera and Israel Rosenberg, wife of the late Sidney Perlov. Died peacefully amidst love and warmth. Survived by children, Susanna and Daniel. Also by children in-law, Karen and Martin, three grandchildren, Miriam, Eva, Francesca and two great-grandchildren. She was a speech pathologist and in 2013 published a children's book, Rifka Takes a Bow, about her childhood in the Yiddish Theater. She was inspirational and will be missed by many. 1/3
